format: A data frame with the following 11 variables.
description:
Description
These are episode-contestant-level data for RuPaul's Drag Race for all available seasons
(currently through Season 14). For a given season, observations mostly decrease with
each episode. Data include all sorts of information.
title: RuPaul's Drag Race Episode-Contestant Data

parameters.contestant: a character vector for the contestant's name
parameters.outcome: a character vector for the outcome for the queen after the main challenge
parameters.missc: a dummy variable indicating if the contestant was Miss Congeniality
parameters.minichalw:
a character vector (0,1) if the queen won a mini-challenge that episode. NOTE: this is a work in progress.
For now, I encourage getting the mini-challenge data from one of the other data sets.
parameters.eliminated: a character vector (0,1) for if the queen was eliminated/removed from the competition after the episode
parameters.rank: a numeric vector for the final rank of the contestant
parameters.finale: a numeric vector for if the episode was the finale
parameters.penultimate: a numeric vector for if the episode was the penultimate before the finale. Applicable to seasons 6, 7, and 8.
parameters.participant: a character vector (0,1) for if the queen was a participant in the show
parameters.episode: a numeric vector for the episode number
parameters.season: a character vector for the season
